coreAttributes.name: lube pill
coreAttributes.description: A round, turquoise lozenge, individually packaged in a foil and plastic wrapper. Small text printed on the foil names it as an 'instant-effect lubrication lozenge', but it's more commonly referred to as a 'lube pill'.
coreAttributes.applyEffects: The round lozenge instantly dissolves in [npc.namePos] mouth, and after swallowing the resulting sugary fluid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] a wave of arcane energy pulse through [npc.her] body. #IF(game.isInSex()) [npc.NamePos] orifices instantly get wet, and a thin layer of slippery, odourless liquid seeps out of [npc.her] [npc.skin] to coat [npc.her] entire body in a thin layer of lubricant. #ELSE As [npc.sheIs] not currently having sex, the pill's lubricating effects don't immediately take effect... #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the lube pill out of its little foil wrapper, before quickly placing it in [npc.her] mouth.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the lube pill out of its little foil wrapper, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and forcing it into [npc2.her] mouth.
